meanings.definition: The neotropics refer to the tropical regions of the Americas.
meanings.sent1: In the neotropics, you can find many different types of plants and animals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the biodiversity of the neotropics to understand its importance.
meanings.sent3: Exploring the neotropics is like entering a vibrant and colorful jungle.
meanings.sent4: The neotropics are a treasure trove of unique species waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the neotropics feels like stepping into a living, breathing ecosystem.

meanings.definition: Neotropics can also describe the flora and fauna found in these regions.
meanings.sent1: The neotropics showcase a rich tapestry of plant and animal life.
meanings.sent2: Many endangered species call the neotropics their home.
meanings.sent3: A walk through the neotropics is like strolling through a natural museum.
meanings.sent4: The neotropics hold a symphony of biodiversity waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the neotropics is a testament to the wonders of nature.
